about_the_game:
Blowing snow has never been more exciting!!!

With the help of trusty worker bots and your super charged snow blower, you'll blast that frosty goodness away and convert it into progression!

CUSTOM MAKE YOUR OWN DOUGHNUTS


Get Helper Robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks, and watch the numbers rise!

Play minigames on your in-game CELLPHONE!


  • Play actively or passively
  • Blow snow virtually
  • Collect snowflakes
  • Collect doughnuts
  • Collect feathers
  • Upgrade your tools to blow snow more efficiently
  • Buy Robots and watch them do the work for you

AGAIN! you can custom make your own doughnuts!!!

Grab your Snow Blower NOW!

name: Snow Blower - Idle Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Device

short_description: Snow Blower - Idle Game is a Free to Play game where you'll blow away snow, employ helper robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks and goals and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
